featured.text: Which of the following statements is explicitly mentioned in the passage? (A) Amy’s father planted carnations in the garden.
If he were here now, Amy knew he would pick one of the prettiest carnations and gave it to Mama.

definition.zh_def: 康乃馨，一種常見的花卉，通常用於花束和裝飾，象徵愛與魅力。
definition.en_def: A carnation is a common flower often used in bouquets and decorations, symbolizing love and fascination.
definition.example: She received a beautiful bouquet of carnations for her birthday.
